text: The 1989 Vuelta a España was the 44th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in A Coruña, with a stage on 24 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 4 May with a stage to Lleida. The race finished in Madrid on 15 May. ==Stage 1== 24 April 1989 — A Coruña to A Coruña, {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider !
